problem_statement: After the recent war of planet Lengaburu with neighbouring planet Falicornia, King Shah has exiled the Queen of Falicornia for 15 years. Queen Al Falcone is now in hiding. But if King Shan can find her before the years are up, she will be exiled for another 15 yearsâ€¦

King Shah has received intelligence that Al Falcone is in hiding in one of these 6 planets : DonLon, Enchai, Jebing, Sapir, Lerbin and Pingasor. However he has limited resources at his disposal and can send his army to only 4 of these planets.
Help King Shah find Falcone by selecting 4 planets and the space vehicle to be sent to them...
falcone_found: Congratulations! You found Falcone from planet
falcone_notfound: Sorry! You did not find Falcone! Try Again.
